text: The Ega is a river in the north of Spain. It is a tributary of the Ebro. The Ega flows through Navarre, but it originates in Álava, near Lagrán, and flows through the town of Estella-Lizarra. == See also == * List of rivers of Spain Category:Rivers of Spain Category:Rivers of Navarre Category:Ebro basin Category:Rivers of Álava Category:Rivers of the Basque Country
title: Ega (river)
